title: "Every little helps" Tesco logo beautiful cursive script
author: DermotHall

comments.content: Sorry, hadn't attached it properly, should be up now

That is reminiscent of a rough digitization of the Coca Cola logo type.

Nick Cooke

Also check out Fenway Park
